document_data.mainbody:
riskrit Darowdryn was the matriarch of the noble House Darowdryn, one of the oldest and wealthiest merchant families of Arrabar and all of Chondath in the 14 century DR.
By 1373 DR, Ariskrit was a matronly woman, almost as old as her good friend, Hetta Matrell.
Ariskrit was old friends with the fellow noble family matriarch Hetta Matrell of the House Matrell. The women were often seen socializing during events of the Arrabarran nobility and visited each other at their families estates.
Ariskrit was often accompanied and protected by her nephew Tharlgarl "Steelfists" Darowdryn.
On Tarsakh 10 of the , Ariskrit Darowdryn and Tharlgarl "Steelfists" attended Emriana Matrells grand celebration of becoming an adult, an Arrabarran tradition for a womans 16 birthday. During the celebration, Ariskrit witnessed an assassination attempt on her friend Hettas life orchestrated by the cabal of Talriccis, Pharaboldis, and, as later revealed, Hettas own family, as retaliation for the matriarchs disapproval of the sneak coin activities. Later, Ariskrit aided young Emriana after her grandmothers spirit was trapped in a magic ring, another sinister ploy by the Talriccis.
